name: Findstr LSASS
description: Detects findstring commands that include the keyword lsass, which indicates recon actviity for the LSASS process PID
query: ((process.executable:/.*\\[Ff][Ii][Nn][Dd][Ss][Tt][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Ll][Ss][Aa][Ss][Ss].*/) OR process.command_line:(/.*\ \/[Ii]\ [Ll][Ss][Aa][Ss][Ss]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee].*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ii]\ \"[Ll][Ss][Aa][Ss][Ss].*/ OR /.*[Ff][Ii][Nn][Dd][Ss][Tt][Rr]\ [Ll][Ss][Aa][Ss][Ss].*/ OR /.*[Ff][Ii][Nn][Dd][Ss][Tt][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]\ [Ll][Ss][Aa][Ss][Ss].*/ OR /.*[Ff][Ii][Nn][Dd][Ss][Tt][Rr]\ \"[Ll][Ss][Aa][Ss][Ss].*/ OR /.*[Ff][Ii][Nn][Dd][Ss][Tt][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]\ \"[Ll][Ss][Aa][Ss][Ss].*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\findstr.exe AND process.command_line:*lsass*) OR process.command_line:(*\ \/i\ lsass.exe* OR *\ \/i\ \"lsass* OR *findstr\ lsass* OR *findstr.exe\ lsass* OR *findstr\ \"lsass* OR *findstr.exe\ \"lsass*))`
